name: SlugGlove Sonic SpeedController
description:
The Sonic Speed controller, is an easy to use third person platformer controller. Modelled after the style of gameplay present in Mario and Sonic platformers. Allowing the player to run and play at high speeds, along with carrying this momentum onto running up walls.

Buy the project here- https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/templates/systems/sonic-speed-controller-1...

Controls 

WASD - to move the player

Arrow Keys- to move the camera

Space- jump up

C- Crouch

Crouch when running to slide, 

jump while sliding to leap

jump when crouching to jump back

Includes:
- Third Person movement
- Wall Running
- Realistic Momentum building for running up and down surfaces
- Ledge Grabbing
- Coin / Point System
- Hazards
- Checkpoints
- Easy to change physics and movement
- Fully animated and Rigged player model
